com.igormaznitsa.prol.io
Class DefaultProlStreamManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.igormaznitsa.prol.io.DefaultProlStreamManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProlStreamManager
public class DefaultProlStreamManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProlStreamManager

The class implements the ProlStreamManager interface and can be used to read-write files and read resources from JAR

Author:
Igor Maznitsa (igor.maznitsa@igormaznitsa.com)
See Also:
ProlStreamManager

getReaderForResource

public java.io.Reader getReaderForResource(java.lang.String resourceName)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Get the reader for a resource

Specified by:
getReaderForResource in interface ProlStreamManager
Parameters:
resourceName - the resource name, must not be null. If the name starts with "@", then it will be used as the name inside JAR resource and will be opened with Class.getResourceAsStream(). The argument must not be null.
Returns:
the opened reader as a Reader object.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown if there will be any transport error.

getWriterForResource

public java.io.Writer getWriterForResource(java.lang.String resourceName,
                                           boolean append)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: ProlStreamManager
Get the writer for an resource for it's name (or to create new resource object)

Specified by:
getWriterForResource in interface ProlStreamManager
Parameters:
resourceName - the name of the opening resource, must not be null
append - if the flag is true then the resource will be opened to add new records at the end of the file, else it will be rewriten
Returns:
an opened text writer, must not be null
Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown if it is impossible to open the resource successfuly
